excuses.excuse: Sorry, I overslept.
My alarm didn't go off.
Traffic was terrible.
I got lost on my way here.
My pet needed emergency care.
I had a family emergency.
My car broke down.
I had a sudden migraine.
I forgot about our appointment.
I had a last-minute work meeting.
My phone died, and I lost track of time.
I had food poisoning.
